divs: Sighting Details two large jets flying west followed by two objects at high altitude seen from window by myself and my mother.they flew out of sight.they appeared to keep pace with the planes.Naturaly we felt wonder and amazment
Summary: Bright white disc and white blimp shaped object traveling fast.
